item.title: Aggregate marketing system simulator for different scenarios and channels
item.description: Preface Running a business is like running a race, and in this term every item is important, so if you have powerful tools and bright minds, you will definitely get in a better position. Google are not only well-known for producing high quality products for users, but also for producing tools that helps us gain lot of insights from any type of data. Today we’ll explore one of them for simulating aggregated marketing times series data.

item.title: On advertising performance evaluation with Data Science in mind
item.description: Preface Imagine that you are the CEO of the company, who clearly see that competitors are actively expanding in a market nevertheless tough times (and when was it different?). Your company produces a handy product or service. At the next meeting, together with the marketing and advertising department, you decided to launch an advertising company aimed to increase sales and brand awareness at the same time. You have chosen specific types of advertising, deciding to go for both offline and online.
